tika-vin07t50:2_2: Sāsanapaccatthikāti attano anācārānuguṇaṁ buddhavacanaṁ pakāsento taṇhāgatikā,
tika-vin07t50:2_5: So saṅgāmāvacaroti so codako saṅgāmāvacaro nāma.
tika-vin07t50:2_12: Ṭhānanisajjavattādinissitāti saṅghamajjhādīsu garucittīkāraṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ṭhānādikkamanissitā ceva cuddasamahāvattādivattanissitā ca, ādi-
tika-vin07t50:2_14: Pañhe uppanneti kenaci uppanne pañhe pucchite.
tika-vin07t50:2_16: yaṁ kiñci upaṭṭhitaṁ dhammaṁ bhāsassūti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t50:3_2: Sannipātamaṇḍaleti attano anuvijjamānappakāraṁ saṅghassa ñāpanatthaṁ uṭṭhāya saṅghasannipātamajjhe ito
tika-vin07t50:3_3: cito ca paresaṁ mukhaṁ olokentena na caritabbaṁ.
tika-vin07t50:3_4: Yathānisinneneva dhammavinayānuguṇaṁ vinicchayaṁ yathā sabbe suṇanti,
tika-vin07t50:4_5: Tenāha “karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca upaṭṭhāpetabboti ayaṁ padadvayepi adhippāyo”ti.
tika-vin07t50:5_2: taṁ kathāpetvā teneva kamena anuyuñjāpetvāti attho.
tika-vin07t50:5_4: “Dhammesu ca puggalesu cā”ti idaṁ “majjhattena bhavitabba”nti pakatena sambandhitabbanti āha “dhammesu ca puggalesu ca…pe…
tika-vin07t50:5_7: taṁ tattha atikkamanto majjhatto nāma na hoti,
tika-vin07t50:5_10: Tasmā imaṁ vidhiṁ anatikkantova tesu majjhattoti veditabbo.
tika-vin07t50:6_0: 366.Saṁsandanatthanti āpatti vā anāpatti vāti saṁsaye jāte saṁsanditvā nicchayakaraṇatthaṁ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t50:6_1: Atthadassanāyāti sādhetabbassa āpattādiupameyyatthassa codakacuditake attano paṭiññāya eva sarūpavibhāvanatthaṁ.
tika-vin07t50:6_2: Attho jānāpanatthāyāti evaṁ vibhāvito attho codakacuditakasaṅghānaṁ ñāpanatthāya nijjhāpanatthāya,
tika-vin07t50:6_4: Puggalassa ṭhapanatthāyāti codakacuditake attano paṭiññāya eva āpattiyaṁ,
tika-vin07t50:6_7: Savacanīyakaraṇatthāyāti dose sāritepi sampaṭicchitvā paṭikammaṁ akarontassa savacanīyakaraṇatthāya.
tika-vin07t50:6_9: Tattha avisaṁvādakaṭṭhāne ṭhitā eva na apasādetabbā,
tika-vin07t50:7_1: Parinibbānañhi nāma khīṇāsavānaṁ sabbapacchimā cuticittakammajarūpasaṅkhātā khandhā,
tika-vin07t50:7_2: te ca sabbākārato samucchinnānusayatāya punabbhavāya anantarādipaccayā na honti aññehi ca taṇhādipaccayehi virahitattā.
tika-vin07t50:7_10: Yathāvuttāya vinayasaṁvarādikāraṇaparamparāya vimuttiyā eva padhānattā sā puna cittassa vimokkhoti uddhaṭoti āha “arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho”ti.
tika-vin07t50:7_11: Atha vā yo yaṁ kiñci dhammaṁ anupādiyitvā parinibbānavasena cittassa cittasantatiyā,
tika-vin07t50:7_12: tappaṭibaddhakammajarūpasantatiyā ca vimokkho vimuccanaṁ apunappavattivasena vigamo,
tika-vin07t50:7_13: etadatthāya etassa vigamassatthāya evāti evaṁ nigamanavasenapettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin07t50:8_4: Tenevātiādīsu teneva katākatassa ajānaneva pubbāparaṁ ajānanassa,
tika-vin07t50:8_7: Attano sadisāyāti yathāvuttehi dosehi yuttatāya attanā sadisāya.
